title: Ocean Secrets
author: Liam Nakamura
summary: After moving to a coastal town, ten-year-old Mia discovers a hidden underwater cave — and the strange creatures living inside it.

pages.text:
Mia hated the ocean. She hated the sound of waves. She hated the smell of salt. She hated the seagulls that screamed outside her new bedroom window at five in the morning.

But here she was, stuck in Tidepool Bay, population 2,300. Her mom had taken a job at the marine biology station. Her dad said it would be "an adventure." Mia called it a disaster.

Their new house was small and blue, perched on a cliff overlooking the Pacific Ocean. The wind never stopped blowing. Sand got into everything — her shoes, her cereal, her homework.

"Give it a chance," her mom said every morning. "You might surprise yourself."

Mia doubted that very much.
